data.title: Secret Invasion Director On What Fans Can Expect ft Ali Selim
data.meta_description: Secret Invasion Director, Ali Selim, sits down with us to discuss what fans can expect from the upcoming MCU series.
data.text:
With an ensemble cast that includes the talents of Samuel L. Jackson, Ben Mendelsohn, Cobie Smulders, Martin Freeman, Kingsley Ben-Adir, Charlayne Woodard, Killian Scott, Samuel Adewunmi, Dermot Mulroney, Christopher McDonald, Katie Finneran, Emilia Clarke, Olivia Colman, and Don Cheadle, “Secret Invasion” promises an explosive and unmissable experience. Under the direction of Ali Selim and the creative leadership of head writer Kyle Bradstreet, the series combines Marvel’s signature storytelling with gripping suspense and unexpected twists.

We got a chance to speak with the director of Secret Invasion, Ali Selim. He shared with us what it took to get the project going, and what fans can expect with the series. Check out his interview in the video below.

Secret Invasion Director Ali Selim Interview

About SECRET INVASION:

In Marvel Studios’ new series “Secret Invasion,” set in the present-day MCU, Nick Fury learns of a clandestine invasion of Earth by a faction of shapeshifting Skrulls. Fury joins his allies, including Everett Ross, Maria Hill and the Skrull Talos, who has made a life for himself on Earth. Together they race against time to thwart an imminent Skrull invasion and save humanity.

SECRET INVASION Trailer:

You can see our other trailer reactions a nd reviews here.

Director: Ali Selim

Writer(s): Kyle Bradstreet

Stars: Samuel L. Jackson, Ben Mendelsohn, Cobie Smulders, Martin Freeman, Kingsley BenAdir, Charlayne Woodard, Killian Scott, Samuel Adewunmi, Dermot Mulroney, Christopher McDonald, Katie

Finneran, with Emilia Clarke, with Olivia Colman, and Don Cheadle

Secret Invasion hits Disney+ June 21, 2023. Be sure to follow E-Man’s Movie Reviews for more reviews and contests. You can follow on Facebook, Subscribe on YouTube, or follow me on Twitter/IG @EmansReviews for even more!
